thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: JONWILL101
title: Great location
text:
Great hotel location one of the best in town for a 5 star hotel.
Club lounge excellent location with views across both sides of the hotel.
Food and wine selection one the best i've seen in Grand Club and the service
from all the staff friendly and attentive. Great Club for meetings as well as just some quiet time. Room was immaculate and the housekeeping doing a great job. Pool is amazing and worth a swim gym is good and all staff friendly and helpful.
highly recommend this hotel to all
Room Tip: Stay in a Club room See more room tips
